title: What did Joseph Stalin do to make everyone hate him? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone didn’t hate him. He was very popular. I’m not a Stalin apologist. He was a cruel and ruthless tyrant. But between endless propaganda and indoctrination, actually making the lives of most Soviet citizens much better, and leading the country to victory in WWII, he was adultated. Intellectuals like me, Party members and Army Officers in the 1930s, and Jews felt otherwise. But these were a tiny minority.

Alas, “everyone” DOESN’T hate him. Everyone SHOULD hate him, but he still has millions of admirers in Russia. And you’ll have no trouble finding History and Political Science professors in major colleges throughout America who will make elaborate excuses for him.
